title: The Fitbit Inspire 3 is 20% CHEAPER at the Moment!
description: Get it for a more affordable price than usual! The post The Fitbit Inspire 3 is 20% CHEAPER at the Moment! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Get it for a more affordable price than usual!
text: For folks who are after a no-nonsense fitness tracker that covers all the basics, the Fitbit Inspire 3 sounds like a great option. Fitbit’s rather-affordable fitness band is currently at its lowest price right now, and this deal on Amazon brings it down to around 80 bucks. In contrast to the more expensive Fitbit Versa models, the Inspire 3 is more of a standard fitness tracker, which comes with a slimmer and lighter design, although it does offer longer battery endurance. It comes with all the features you’d expect from a fitness tracker including heart rate monitoring, SPO2 and sleep tracking, and more than 20 different exercise modes. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. html:
For folks who are after a no-nonsense fitness tracker that covers all the basics, the Fitbit Inspire 3 sounds like a great option. Fitbit’s rather-affordable fitness band is currently at its lowest price right now, and this deal on Amazon brings it down to around 80 bucks.

In contrast to the more expensive Fitbit Versa models, the Inspire 3 is more of a standard fitness tracker, which comes with a slimmer and lighter design, although it does offer longer battery endurance. It comes with all the features you’d expect from a fitness tracker including heart rate monitoring, SPO2 and sleep tracking, and more than 20 different exercise modes.
